event-listing.description: Social media and other platforms on which the event is advertised.

username.description: A user account who is going to the event.

person-name.description: A person who is going to the event.

administrator.description: A user account who is an owner or admin of the event.

hashtag.description: Hashtag used to identify or promote the event.

url.description: Original URL location of the event (potentially malicious).

link.description: Original link into the event (supposed harmless).

phone-number.description: Phone number of the event contact.

fax-number.description: Fax number of the event contact.

e-mail.description: Email address of the event contact.

embedded-link.description: Link embedded in the event description (potentially malicious).

embedded-safe-link.description: Link embedded in the event description (supposed safe).

archive.description: Archive of the original event (Internet Archive, Archive.is, etc).

attachment.description: A screen capture or other attachment relevant to the event.

scheduled-date.description: Initial creation of the microblog post

description: Event object template describing a gathering of individuals in meatspace.
name: scheduled-event
